Description.Text: Ameritania is in New York's entertainment center. Scores of restaurants and the bright lights of Broadway are just steps away, with no need to fight for taxis after the show. Showcasing style and witty design, this Midtown hotel is just around the corner from Broadway's excitement and three blocks from prime Fifth Avenue shops.

• Broadway theaters - Surrounding area • Carnegie Hall - 3 blocks • Museum of Modern Art - 4 blocks • Central Park - 5 blocks • Rockefeller Center - 5 blocks • Radio City Music Hall - 5 blocks • Columbus Circle (Time Warner Center, CNN tour, shopping/dining) - 5 blocks • St. Patrick's Cathedral - 7 blocks • Central Park Zoo - 10 blocks • Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts - 10 blocks • Times Square - 12 blocks • Garment District - 12 blocks • Grand Central Terminal - 1 mile • Madison Square Garden - 1 mile

Ameritania Hotel offers 210 guestrooms in a 12-story building. Cecor includes tall leather headboards, neutral colors, upholstered reading chairs, and low platform beds with Belgian linens, down comforters, and multiple pillows. Conveniences include desks, two-line telephones, and wireless Internet access (surcharge). CD players and televisions with pay movies and video games provide entertainment. Compact refrigerators are available for surcharges. Gilchrist & Soames toiletries are provided.

Located in the Theatre District on the corner of 54th Street and Broadway, the Ameritania Hotel New York is very popular with the hip, theater-going crowd. But, business travelers and other non-theater lovers will also find the Ameritania central to many of New York’s biggest attractions -- some within walking distance. Penn Station is 20 blocks, Central Park is five blocks, New York’s Museum of Modern Art is just two blocks from the Ameritania, and Times Square is five blocks away. The Jacob Javitz Convention Center is also 10 minutes by taxi.

Driving directions from LaGuardia: Take Grand Central Pkwy west to I-278 (Brooklyn-Queens Expy) west. Exit to SR 25A and bear right onto Queens Plaza N. Continue on Queensboro Bridge and exit to 2nd Ave south. Turn left on 2nd, then turn right on E 57th St. Turn left on Broadway, and follow it to W 54th St.
